idea:
Oorjan brings solar energy to end consumers in India. We have 1200+ customers across 14 states for residential and industrial segments. Company is co-founded by IIT Mumbai (and ISB / Berkley / Stanford) Alumni each with 15+ years of experience collectively across Solar, Engineering, Finance and Technology.
Oorjan offers -
Premium Solar | Easy Finance | Greener Future
Oorjan started of in three domains viz., Installation, Financing and Technology
 In a short span of time, Oorjan has set up offices in 5 locations and served consumers in 14
states across all three consumer segments – Industrial, Residential and Commercial
Commercial and Industrial users ranging from 100 kW to 1000 kW have been installed with a targeted timeline of 45 days
Oorjan has also started providing consultancy to large multinationals for planning and setting up new Ground mount captive or Open Access solar plants ranging up to 20 Megawatt
Oorjan is also working with its clients to make their existing installations more efficient by doing a detailed technical analysis of the plant
Oorjan provides competitive OPEX options to customers considering world class hardware brands as well as safety and maintenance at international standards
Oorjan’s in-house monitoring tool helps customers access their generation, get alerts on performance as well as maintenance, compare with the pan region generation and keep a track on the return on investment. For multiple installation, Customer can have a single dashboard giving out all the KPIs
name: OORJAN CLEANTECH PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Smarthome NX is a discovery platform for consumers to find inspiration, products and services that will help them adopt the best and most affordable technology which saves energy, time and effort. 

1) Consumers can read and understand about the latest Smart home technology products. 

2) They can buy affordable Smart home devices from our e-commerce store

3) Most of all, consumers can speak to our lifestyle consultant and get recommended options for the best Smart home kit to go with. Depending on the choice of the customer, he or she may choose to go for multiple devices or systems and get them installed - all through one platform - Smarthome NX. This makes it extremely convenient and effective as he does not have to communicate with multiple vendors, moreover, he does not have to rely on biased views of the manufacturer and he also gets a variety of options in terms of solutions specifically for his home.

idea:
EasyQueue is A Digital Cafe Solution that ushers you to a digital platform where all canteen/food court processes like ordering, payment, feedback, tax benefits and queue management are administered virtually.

A queueless ordering approach which provides a comprehensive and integrated solution for digitally managing the cafeteria with our own Point of Sale system and Vendor Panel for accessing all the reports on the go via a cloud server. It also helps to save valuable time for the Employee and in turn, reduces the Stress level and increases their Productivity.

We also undertake turnkey projects for End to End Canteen Management, which includes maintaining the level of hygiene, certifications from FSSAI, HAACP, etc. and a vast selection of curated Caterers to choose from. Some of our satisfied clients are Mahindra & Mahindra Ltd., Network18, Welspun India and ICICI Prudential.
